remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来确保`element`接收触笔事件甚至当光标离开元素的边界。Use the method to ensure that `element` receives stylus events even when the cursor goes out of the elements' bounds. 若要释放触笔，调用与设置为。To release the stylus, call with the set to . 方法将返回`false`如果`element`不可见或启用。The method returns `false` if `element` is not visible or enabled. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何录制的触笔的坐标，即使在触笔离开的边界。The following example demonstrates how to record the coordinates of the stylus, even if the stylus leaves the bounds of a . 此示例假定存在称为`textBox1`，并且， ，和事件连接到事件处理程序。This example assumes there is a called `textBox1`, and that the , , and events are connected to event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个附加的事件。This is an attached event. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 附加事件作为路由事件实现。 implements attached events as routed events. 附加的事件也是，从根本上说，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语言概念，用于引用事件的处理不是这样，对象本身，定义的事件。Attached events are, fundamentally, a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] language concept used to reference events that are handled on objects that do not, themselves, define events. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]进一步扩展了附加的事件的功能，使其能够遍历路由。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] further expands an attached event's capabilities, allowing it to traverse a route. 附加的事件的代码; 中没有直接处理语法若要附加的代码中的路由事件处理程序，使用指定的添加 \* 处理程序方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, use a designated Add\*Handler method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何更改的背景色时捕获并释放触笔事件。The following example demonstrates how to change the background color of a when the captures and releases stylus events. 此示例假定是名为的 textbox `textBox1`，并且和事件连接到事件处理程序。This example assumes that there is a textbox called `textBox1`, and that the and events are connected to event handlers. [!code-csharp[StylusSamples#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#10)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#10)]

[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 进一步扩展了附加的事件的功能，使其能够遍历路由。 further expands an attached event's capabilities, allowing it to traverse a route. 附加的事件的代码; 中没有直接处理语法若要附加的代码中的路由事件处理程序，使用指定的添加 \* 处理程序方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, use a designated Add\*Handler method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|隧道Tunneling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何确定哪些触笔位于的元素上。The following example demonstrates how to determine which element the stylus is positioned over. 此示例假定有称为`textBox1`，并且事件连接到的事件处理程序。This example assumes that there is a called `textBox1`, and that the event is connected to the event handler. [!code-csharp[StylusSamples#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#15)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#15)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个附加的事件。This is an attached event. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 附加事件作为路由事件实现。 implements attached events as routed events. 附加的事件时，从根本上说，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语言概念，用于引用事件的处理不是这样，对象本身，定义的事件。An attached event is, fundamentally, a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] language concept used to reference events that are handled on objects that do not, themselves, define events. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 进一步扩展了附加的事件的功能，使其能够遍历路由。 further expands an attached event's capabilities, allowing it to traverse a route. 附加的事件的代码; 中没有直接处理语法若要附加的代码中的路由事件处理程序，使用指定的添加 \* 处理程序方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, use a designated Add\*Handler method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在用户按上触笔的笔杆按钮时显示快捷菜单。The following example demonstrates how to show a shortcut menu when the user presses the barrel button on a stylus. 此示例假定有称为`textBox1`，和一个调用`textBoxContextMenu`，并且事件连接到的事件处理程序。This example assumes that there is a called `textBox1`, and a called `textBoxContextMenu`, and that the event is connected to the event handler. [!code-csharp[StylusSamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个附加的事件。This is an attached event. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 附加事件作为路由事件实现。 implements attached events as routed events. 附加的事件时，从根本上说，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]语言概念，用于引用事件的处理不是这样，对象本身，定义的事件。An attached event is, fundamentally, a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] language concept used to reference events that are handled on objects that do not, themselves, define events. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 进一步扩展了附加的事件的功能，使其能够遍历路由。 further expands an attached event's capabilities, allowing it to traverse a route. 附加的事件的代码; 中没有直接处理语法若要附加的代码中的路由事件处理程序，使用指定的添加 \* 处理程序方法。Attached events do not have a direct handling syntax in code; to attach handlers for a routed event in code, use a designated Add\*Handler method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md)。For details, see [Attached Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-events-overview.md). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何确定哪些触笔位于的元素上。The following example demonstrates how to determine which element the stylus is positioned over. 此示例假定有称为`textBox1`并且事件连接到的事件处理程序。This example assumes that there is a called `textBox1` and that the event is connected to the event handler. [!code-csharp[StylusSamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#3)]
